long_description: The ultra-compact eGear PICO LED Zipper Lite provides a powerful light source in a diminutive, durable package. Powerful, 10-lumen LED light shines up to 30 ft. Rugged anodized aluminum body is water-resistant to IPX 4 standards (stands up to splashes). Rotating bezel switch helps prevent light from being turned on inadvertently; bezel is knurled for a good grip when it's wet or cold. Mini carabiner clip and split ring make it easy to attach the eGear PICO LED Zipper Lite just about anywhere you need a light source. eGear PICO LED Zipper Lite runs on 4 LR-41 Alkaline batteries (included).
short_description: The ultra-compact eGear PICO LED Zipper Lite provides a powerful light source in a diminutive, durable package.
